column4: I need some help figuring out how to mount my PSP read and write, and make it do so automatically in the future.
Ubuntu see this like flash drive
Yes, but I don't know how to make it write capable.
try sudo mkdir /media/PSP && sudo chown your_username:users /media/PSP && sudo chmod 755 /media/PSP && sudo mount -t vfat /dev/sdb1 -o users /media/PSP
